Package backend.physics

Interface Summary
BallPhysics BallPhysics - represents a 3-dimensional ball in space to be used in the Gizmoball game - MAKE SURE EVERYTHING THAT IS JAVA3D returns new objects
GizmoPhysics GizmoPhysics - defines all methods that gizmos must implement in order to be succesfully processed by the engine
MobileGizmoPhysics MobileGizmoPhysics - represents a gizmo that is free to move around the playing board but only within a specfied space
PiecePhysics PiecePhysics - a piece of the gizmoball game - do not implement this class Use subinterfaces to get access to these methods
RotatableGizmoPhysics RotatableGizmoPhysics - represents all gizmos that are rotable about a pivot point
StaticGizmoPhysics StaticGizmoPhysics - staic gizmos are gizmos that do not move in an animated manner.
